column1: Little Goat Diner////It's a small dish of crab dip
column2: and then bordered by a single layer of Ritz crackers. Problem is
column3: the amount of crab dip you get is pretty good
column4: but you get like 8 Ritz crackers
column5: which is hardly enough to have half. You pretty much have to mound it on the cracker if you want to use it all up. We didn't
column6: so I used the rest to flavorize my tempura mashed potato. The crab dip is good. It's cheesy
column9: but it was good. I might consider getting it again if I ever came back.
